message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial outcome.

Alice, your offer was a bit too much in your favor. Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing a 70/30 split.  Time is money, and every round costs us.  Take this offer before inflation eats away at your potential gains.

Bob, let's meet in the middle. We both lost money in the last round, so we need to be pragmatic.  I'm proposing a 45/55 split, which is closer to your last offer.  Let's end this game before we lose too much more.
